product_name: Living ProofTravel Size Style Lab Flex Hairspray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof Style Lab Flex Hairspray is a medium-hold spray that can be used to set, style and finish without stiffness for touchable, brushable styles.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides a medium level of holdSets, styles and finishes on damp or dry hairDelivers flexible, touchable controlAdds softness and shineBrushable, layerable and reworkableProvides heat protection (up to 410 F/210 C)For most hair typesSafe for color and chemically treated hairCruelty-freeFree of silicones, SLES and SLS, parabens, phthalates and glutenKey IngredientsFlexible Web Technology: Allows for maximum versatility on damp or dry hair to provide multi-styling benefits and medium holdConditioning Emollient: Adds lubricity, brushability and shinePanthenol (Vitamin B5): Adds softness and conditioningItem 2511910How To UseSpray on damp hair to build a structured style. Apply on dry hair to style or finish with or without heat.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Water/Eau/Aqua, Polyurethane-14, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, AMP-Acrylates Copolymer, Panthenol, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaoleate, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Triethyl Citrate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Spray on damp hair to build a structured style. Apply on dry hair to style or finish with or without heat.

reviews.headline: Great everyday hairspray
reviews.comments: This hairspray has been great for adding a light hold to my hair and keeps it feeling soft. I'm not a fan of string hold hairspray due to how knotted my hair will get and the uncomfortable feeling of it so I have really enjoyed this flexible hair spray by Living Proof. (Gifted by Living Proof)

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: Complimentary from livingproof! I love this hairspray! It holds my curls super well without weighing me down or feeling crunchy like some other brands. I was able to go an extra day without touching up my hair!

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: This hair spray is actually very good. It's interesting that it can be used with heat! I have 3A curls and I blow dry my hair every once in a while. This product has helped reduce my fizz and it maintains my hair in shape! Gifted by livingproof

reviews.headline: Great hold
reviews.comments: I've tried a lot of Living Proof products and honestly love them all, and their setting spray is no exception. I have bangs, so that's always my main concern - without a good spray, they can look dull and flat. This one gives just the right hold: strong enough to keep everything in place but still flexible so my hair doesn't feel stiff. I reach for it all the time when I'm styling my bangs! I received this product complimentary from Living proof in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Soft but keeping everything in place
reviews.comments: I really like it! It gives my hair a soft, flexible hold without making it feel stiff or sticky. I love that I can still run my fingers through my hair and it keeps everything in place. It also works great whether I curl or straighten my hair, which makes it super versatile. Definitely one of those sprays that you can use daily without feeling heavy on your hair. *gifted by living proof

reviews.headline: New fav
reviews.comments: I love this hairspray! As someone with long and thick hair, with lots of texture, when I take the time to style it, I really need something that will have a firm hold. This makes my hair stay in the style all day without feeling sticky or hard. I'm a fan! Gifted by living proof

reviews.headline: Loveeeee
reviews.comments: Complimentary from Living Proof. I'm obsessed with this hair spray - heat protectant and hairspray in one?? twist my arm! it gives me a workable/flexible control to my styles without any crunchiness. love!!

reviews.headline: Light & Flexible Spray
reviews.comments: I received this hairspray complimentary from livingproof for review, and it makes my hair look smooth and finished while still moving naturally. I like that it adds a touch of polish without weighing my hair down or making it feel sticky. The hold is medium, so it's better for casual, everyday looks than super structured styles, but for that soft, natural finish it works really well.

reviews.headline: Lightweight
reviews.comments: New favorite hairspray for sure! This is the lightest formula I swear- not sticky or crunchy at all. Has a good flexible hold. Used it for a wedding and was happy with how long my hair lasted. Gifted by living proof

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Gifted by Living Proof. It has become my absolute favorite. It smells so good. I love the fact that it's brushable and doesn't leave your hair feeling hard. I can still run my fingers through my curls. And it holds my curls all day. I can't recommend this enough.

reviews.headline: Heat Protection & Medium Hold Hairspray!
reviews.comments: Gone are the days of crispy, sticky, and flaky hairspray! Living Proof's Flex Hairspray is a game changer! This is a multi-purpose product that can be used on wet hair as a heat protector and to help smooth and set your hairstyle as it's being blown dry. It can also of course be used on dry hair to help with heat protection from hot tools and to finish styles with a medium hold. This helps slick backed looks to manage flyaways as well. I love this because unlike other hairsprays, my curls really did hold up significantly longer, and my hair still felt soft, shiny, and bouncy without a heavy, sticky hairspray feel. I recommend this hairspray if you like to heat style and curl your hair! Gifted by Living Proof.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I have used this brand little but all the reviews I have read are fabulous and they were all right this cream is a wonder deeply moisturizes and allows you to penetrate and stay with longer with well-groomed and stylized hair I have definitely loved it I recommend it to my family and friends gifted by living proof

reviews.headline: Great hairspray
reviews.comments: This hairspray is perfect for everyday useâ€”it gives a flexible hold that keeps your style in place without feeling stiff or crunchy. The scent is light and fresh, not overwhelming, so it leaves your hair looking polished and touchable while still feeling natural. Gifted by Living Proof.

reviews.headline: Flexible, workable spray
reviews.comments: This hairspray is flexible and workable while effectively keeping my style in place. Hair is not stiff. This hairspray is unique because it has built in heat protection and allows me to style my hair with dry or damp hair. A true multitasker! Gifted by Living Proof.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: I love this medium hold hairspray! Living Proof Style Lab Flex Hairspray is a medium-hold spray that can be used to set, style and finish without stiffness for touchable, brushable styles. It last all day! Complimentary from livingproof

reviews.headline: Love this hairspray!
reviews.comments: Love this hairspray! I have short hair so I can be pretty picky about hair productsâ€” this one is my favorite for strong hold that doesn't look or feel crunchy. And it smells great too! (Complimentary from livingproof)

reviews.headline: Great Hair Day Hairspray
reviews.comments:
Style Lab Flex Hairspray is my new go to styling hairspray! I love how manageable and soft my hair feels after styling and applying this hairspray. Other hairsprays leave my hair hard and stiff, Style Lab Flex Hairspray has my hair looking and feeling like a million bucks! 
Complimentary from livingproof

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: Complimentary from livingproof ever since having kids my hair will not hold a curl for the life of me. Not even kidding I will curl it and it will be flat an hour later. Decided to try this hairspray and by my surprise my hair stayed curling until THE NEXT DAYâ€¦ amazed.

reviews.headline: I would buy!
reviews.comments: Wonderful product!! The hairspray package is beautiful and the way that the product feels on my hair is fantastic. I wouldn't use another hair spray! It holds my curls together and leaves a beautiful look. Gifted by living proof

reviews.headline: Finally, hairspray that holds without the crunch!
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Living Proof, and I'm not saying it changed my life but my hair has never known peace like this. This Flex Hairspray from Living Proof is the unicorn of styling products. It holds my curls through Texas humidity like it owes me money but still lets me run my fingers through like I'm starring in a shampoo ad. It's lightweight. Smells clean not chemical. No sticky film that makes you feel like you used glue in a crisis. I used it for work days date nights and gym ponytails and it held up like it had something to prove. Whether you're styling for practicality or glam this spray adapts like it's trying to win custody of your hair.

media.headline: This was the only spray that helped me keep my curls!
Held up for hours
media.caption: Very good hold, not too heavy

media.headline: I would used this product again!
Long lasting and doesn't make my hair stiff!
media.caption: Held my curls in place!

media.headline: Finally a hairspray I can use!

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this for review by  Living Proof & I am so glad I did! I am not a user of hairspray because I have dry frizzy hair so why would I put something on it that will add to its dryness? This doesn't and it doesn't look like you have used hairspray... you know what I mean, that crunchy stick dry look that hairspray gives people. I'm not a news anchor or running for public office, I don't like that look. This hairspray doesn't do that, it just makes your hair have that finished healthy shine. I will be purchasing when I run out of this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally a hairspray I can use!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have thick curly hair that I wear straight most days. On day 2 or 3, I will sometimes add some loose curls and this is when the hairspray comes in. I use Living Proof Perfect Hair Day cream when I straighten and I also use the Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo - the scent on those products is great. It smells clean and is not overpowering at all. I'm pretty sensitive to smells, and this hairspray has a different scent than the other products I've used. It's definitely more perfume-y. I won't be returning it, as I've yet to find a replacement, but I won't buy it again. The hold is ok - but it doesn't live up to the other Living Proof products I've used and love.
faceoff_negative.headline: Love the brand - smell is too strong

rollup.name: Travel Size Style Lab Flex Hairspray
